column4: I have a question.  I do not know how "related to Ubuntu" this is, but I wanted to ask you, because I know you're a knowledgable group of people.  What I would like to do, is make bandwidth logs for my server.  I would like to know if there is a program available for Linux that can make logs like this one...  http://voyager.unitedfederationofgaming.com/~kirk/Temporary/sample.png  ... That's from a local ISP, don't redistribute that if possible but
or Cactus... i'm not sure which one is more popular or usable
look for "mrtg". Ubuntu doesn't package cactus so you might have to google a bit ;)
